casebody.data: Appeal of HEIRY HIRSCHMANN, as executor, and KATIE H. WEINBERG, as executrix, estate of SOLOMON HIRSCHMANN. Docket No. 685. Submitted March 11, 1925; decided March 16, 1925. J. N. Nathans, Esq., for the taxpayer. L. G. Mitchell, Esq., for the Commissioner. Before Geaupner, LaNsdok, LittletoN, and Smith. [NO OPINION]
